events.name: key strategic issues in operations and supply chain management for the automobile battery industry
events.wd_label: key strategic issues in operations and supply chain management for the automobile battery industry
events.wd_description: This research identifies strategic issues in operations and SCM for the automobile battery industry, focusing on demand assessment, supply fulfillment, and creating a network to bridge demand and supply.
events.description: This research identifies strategic issues in operations and SCM for the automobile battery industry, focusing on demand assessment, supply fulfillment, and creating a network to bridge demand and supply.

events.name: demand assessment
events.wd_description: Demand assessment includes forecasting sales and estimating warranty replacements to ensure accurate projections in the automotive battery industry.
events.description: Demand assessment includes forecasting sales and estimating warranty replacements to ensure accurate projections in the automotive battery industry.

events.name: supply fulfillment
events.wd_description: Supply fulfillment involves production planning to meet the assessed demand, taking into account various product mixes and production complexities.
events.description: Supply fulfillment involves production planning to meet the assessed demand, taking into account various product mixes and production complexities.

events.name: network creation
events.wd_description: Creating an agile network involves strategic inventory planning to ensure timely and location-specific dispatches of automotive batteries.
events.description: Creating an agile network involves strategic inventory planning to ensure timely and location-specific dispatches of automotive batteries.

events.name: supply chain management in the Indian automotive battery industry
events.wd_label: supply chain management in the Indian automotive battery industry
events.wd_description: SCM in the Indian automotive battery industry focuses on integrating suppliers, manufacturers, warehouses, and customers to minimize system-wide costs and maximize profit and market share.
events.description: SCM in the Indian automotive battery industry focuses on integrating suppliers, manufacturers, warehouses, and customers to minimize system-wide costs and maximize profit and market share.

events.name: supplier integration
events.wd_description: Integrating suppliers involves coordinating with raw material providers to ensure a steady supply for battery production.
events.description: Integrating suppliers involves coordinating with raw material providers to ensure a steady supply for battery production.

events.name: manufacturer integration
events.wd_description: Integrating manufacturers focuses on aligning production processes and schedules to meet the supply chain demands.
events.description: Integrating manufacturers focuses on aligning production processes and schedules to meet the supply chain demands.

events.name: warehouse integration
events.wd_description: Integrating warehouses involves managing storage and distribution centers to facilitate efficient battery logistics.
events.description: Integrating warehouses involves managing storage and distribution centers to facilitate efficient battery logistics.

events.name: customer integration
events.wd_description: Integrating customers ensures that the end-product is distributed to the right place at the right time, fulfilling customer demands.
events.description: Integrating customers ensures that the end-product is distributed to the right place at the right time, fulfilling customer demands.

events.name: Production Planning
events.description: Strategic issue in meeting supply which involves planning production considering the complexity of multiple factors and different product mixes.

events.name: Inventory Planning
events.description: Key strategic driver for creating an agile network, focusing on location-specific, material-specific, and time-bound dispatches.

events.name: Warranty Replacement Forecasting
events.description: Part of demand assessment, which includes forecasting warranty replacements along with sales projections.
